name: Awesome Fetchquests Done Quick
description:
Game is recommended to be played in full screen.

A game made for the Trinity College Sci-fi and Fantasy Society's 2021 Game Jam Event, by Oli and Abigail.

Travel around a small town collecting items and trading them in order to get your end goal item.

The theme of the was "Quid Pro Quo", the game demonstrates this as each trade is done in a manner of one item given for another, a quid pro quo between the player and the NPC.
